author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. officials hopeful about May 1 target date for reopening U.S.
description: The Trump administration views May 1 as a target date for relaxing stay-at-home restrictions across the United States, Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Stephen Hahn said on Sunday, but he cautioned that it was still too early to say that target would…
